collection resource for all products, and /companies/{id}/products is  
th=
e company-specific one. I assume that in both cases, you'd return a  
list =
of links.

Beware of over-emphasizing URI meaning, though -- it's nice to h=
ave  
readable URIs, but they shouldn't "leak" into your design.
